text:
🙏 Please don't forget to participate to #VACOLUP (#CovidVaccine in #lupus). The study is available in English, Español, Français & Italiano🗺️. We provide WEEKLY reports ⏲️ about the tolerance of #Covid19 #vaccine to the #SLE #patient 🐺 community.
